title: I'M BACK, YOUTUBE! Here We Go! Fact-Checking the Fact-Checkers on Lockdown DECEPTION!
description:
Crowder is back on YouTube! We take a look at the “fact” checker claiming the lockdowns worked. SPOILER: Pants on fire. We also cover all you need to know about the Virginia governor’s race. And what dumb things is Colin Kaepernick going on about now?

PROMO CODE: FIGHTLIKEHELL
